display.value: Yes, patient is a documented donor and documentation is on file

definition.value: Yes, patient is a documented donor and documentation is on file

display.value: Yes, patient is a documented donor, but documentation is not on file

definition.value: Yes, patient is a documented donor, but documentation is not on file

display.value: No, patient has not agreed to be a donor

definition.value: No, patient has not agreed to be a donor

display.value: No, patient is not a documented donor, but information was provided

definition.value: No, patient is not a documented donor, but information was provided

display.value: Patient leaves organ donation decision to relatives

definition.value: Patient leaves organ donation decision to relatives

display.value: Patient leaves organ donation decision to a specific person

definition.value: Patient leaves organ donation decision to a specific person
